docs.title: Welcome to Linson Philip's Portfolio
docs.text: I am an Electrical Engineer specialized in Renewable Energy and Data Engineering. I have a strong background in power systems design, data analysis, and simulation tools like LTspice and Simulink. I am passionate about leveraging data to optimize energy efficiency and system reliability.

docs.title: About Me
docs.text: I am an Electrical Engineer with expertise in Renewable Energy and Data Engineering. My passion lies in designing and optimizing power systems and leveraging data for efficiency improvements.

docs.title: Education
docs.text:
• M.Sc. in Renewable Energy and Data Engineering Hochschule Offenburg, Germany
  • B.Tech in Electrical and Electronics Engineering University of Kerala, India

docs.title: Key Interests
docs.text:
• Power System Design
  • Machine Learning in Energy
  • Data Analysis and Engineering

docs.title: Digital Twin for Efficiency Filter
docs.text:
• Tools Used: LTspice, Simulink
  • Description: Developed a digital twin model to simulate and optimize power systems.
  • Achievements: Achieved 95% accuracy in simulation results.

docs.title: Micro-PV Systems Monitoring
docs.text:
• Tools Used: Python, SQL
  • Description: Led data collection and analysis for PV systems, optimizing energy output.
  • Achievements: Improved energy efficiency by 10%.

docs.title: Power Grid Optimization
docs.text:
• Tools Used: MATLAB, Python
  • Description: Designed and implemented optimization algorithms for grid management.
  • Achievements: Enhanced grid reliability by reducing power losses.
